title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma…) with a single CLI or REST API; ships macOS/Linux/Windows binaries and a Go library.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and async helpers; pip-installable wrapper around the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official npm package offering a thin TypeScript/JavaScript client for browser, Node and Deno.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you use any Ollama-hosted model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: llama-index-llms-ollama
summary: LlamaIndex reader + LLM pack to plug Ollama models into RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Community-built ChatGPT-like web UI that talks to a local Ollama server; no data leaves your machine.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with readline, conversation history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (cuda/rocm/cpu) with one-liner to run Llama 3 in a container.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM library (Maven Central) providing synchronous and reactive clients for Ollama.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API with ActiveModel-style interfaces.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package enabling on-device or edge inference via an Ollama backend.

title: open-webui
summary: Full-featured self-hosted AI interface (formerly Ollama WebUI) with RAG, voice, image support and plugin store.

title: ollama-coder
summary: JetBrains IDE plugin providing local code completion, explain & refactor actions via Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: fine-tune Modelfiles, build RAG, function-calling, edge deployment, GPU tuning.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module providing decorators and services to inject Ollama models into TypeScript backends.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: End-to-end RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Chainlit for PDF question-answering.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into your server with slash commands and threads.
